name: High Flyer b-savegame [C64]
description:
Welcome to my visual novel! In the story, you live in a world where every action you take is evaluated and given a score. There are 4 endings, which one you get is determined by a point-based system.

This is a prototype and was made in about four days, so there are unfortunately no fancy graphics :(. If the writing seems rushed, that's because it was. 

I hope you'll still enjoy playing!

~ Celeste
